content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 **measurements ** finished chest fullest point circumference 79 89 99 109 119 129 139 149 159 cm / 31 35 39 43 47 51 55 58½ 62½ - to be worn with 5-10cm / 2-4 ease model is 180cm / 5 11 tall has a 99cm / 39 chest circumference and is wearing a size 4 **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g yarn a hilma 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 8 9 balls yarn b caterpillar 1 ball yarn c heart of gold 1 ball yarn d heart of glass 1 ball yarn e terrazzo 2 2 3 3 4 4 5 5 6 balls yarn f zinnia 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 3 balls **needles ** 4mm / us 6 circular needles 40cm / 16 and 60-100cm / 24-40 length 4 5mm / us 7 circular needles 40cm / 16 length 60-100cm / 24-40 length depending on size worked and needles suitable for working small circumferences in the round always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 18 sts & 23 row = 10cm / 4 over st st on 4 5mm needles after blocking **pattern information ** kiln is worked seamlessly from the top down with raglan increases and german short row to shape the neck on the lower body and sleeves 3 contrast colors are added to work vertical rectangles with both intarsia and stranded techniques a checkerboard pattern is worked in another two contrast colors before working the ribbed hems **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 http //hobbii de/kiln-colourwork-cardigan
